item.title: New Board: General Programming
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:31, topic:340250”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=436616.msg3209192#msg3209192 date=1274067254]
please ban the following languages from this board:

[ul][li]HTML[/li][li]Visual Basic[/li][list][/list][/ul]

[/quote]

Why?[/quote][quote=“deathschaos9, post:32, topic:340250”]HTML isn’t a programming language and he has an issue with VB now, cant imagine why tho [size=1pt][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,436395.msg3206034.html#msg3206034[/url]Maybe this >.>[/size] :|[/quote]Death is right about HTML, but personally I don’t like Visual Basic (not only because of that thread). It was the first language I learned, but after learning a bit of a few other languages you realize how bad(and easy) Visual Basic is.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:

[quote=“Frell, post:29, topic:340250”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=436616.msg3209712#msg3209712 date=1274129630]

By general programming we mean general programming. All languages allowed.

You mean all programming languages allowed right? Are you planning on allowing scripting languages into the programming board?
Maybe we should compose a list of acceptable languages?
[/quote]
The languages we expect are c++, java, c#, VB, and all the other main programming languages. Scripting is scripting not programming,[/quote]

k

[/quote]

item.title: New Board: General Programming
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:21, topic:340250”]please ban the following languages from this board:

[ul][li]HTML[/li][li]Visual Basic[/li][list][/list][/ul][/quote]
Unfortunately, against my own wishes, we cannot ban Visual Basic as it still is classified as programming language. On the other hand, I agree with HTML not being a “programming language” because it’s a markup language which is in essence is like bbcode.

I cannot make that decision on myself therefore I’ll discuss it with other members of staff before making it a set rule.

Read full topic

item.title: New Board: General Programming
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:19, topic:340250”][quote author=Frell link=topic=436616.msg3208753#msg3208753 date=1274039236]

[quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=436616.msg3208721#msg3208721 date=1274037605]

Because the whole point of moparscape is to help educate those interested in java (and runescape also). So when those special members that want to break away from RSPS and create their own stuff pop up they have somewhere to post. Before no one would ever go to mitb for something like this, so we added a board here to see the outcome. Hopefully more people will start to understand java better and either contribute to RSPS more or create their own useful tools.
[/quote]why are you so inclined into thinking everything revolves around java

That was the original idea, at the last second lothy suggested we change it to general programming.

And guess what language this site mainly revolves around…
[/quote]only because the few actual server bases that were publicly released were written in java, still doesn’t mean that someone with a clue won’t make a useful contribution in another language though[/quote]
And they still can.

Read full topic

That was the original idea, at the last second lothy suggested we change it to general programming.

And guess what language this site mainly revolves around…[/quote]only because the few actual server bases that were publicly released were written in java, still doesn’t mean that someone with a clue won’t make a useful contribution in another language though
